# RecognizeTextRequest

**Structure**

An image-analysis request that recognizes text in an image.

## Declaration

```swift
struct RecognizeTextRequest
```

## Overview

This request generates a collection of [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/RecognizedTextObservation] objects that describe the text the request detects. By default, a text-recognition request first locates all possible glyphs or characters in the input image, and then analyzes each string. To specify or limit the languages to find in the request, set [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/RecognizeTextRequest/recognitionLanguages] to an array that contains the names of the languages of text you want to recognize.

## Creating a request

- **init(_:)**: Creates a text-recognition request.

## Getting the revision

- **revision**: The algorithm or implementation the request uses.
- **supportedRevisions**: The collection of revisions the request supports.
- **RecognizeTextRequest.Revision**: A type that describes the algorithm or implementation that the request performs.

## Inspecting a request

- **automaticallyDetectsLanguage**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to attempt detecting the language to use the appropriate model for recognition and language correction.
- **usesLanguageCorrection**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request applies language correction during the recognition process.
- **supportedRecognitionLanguages**: The identifiers of the languages that the request supports.
- **customWords**: An array of strings to supplement the recognized languages at the word-recognition stage.
- **minimumTextHeightFraction**: The minimum height, relative to the image height, of the text to recognize.
- **recognitionLanguages**: An array of languages to detect, in priority order.
- **recognitionLevel**: A value that determines whether the request prioritizes accuracy or speed in text recognition.
- **RecognizeTextRequest.RecognitionLevel**: Constants that identify the performance and accuracy of the text recognition.

## Performing a request

- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on an image URL and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on image data and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Graphics image and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a pixel buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Media buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Image image and produces observations.
- **RecognizedTextObservation**: An object that contains information about both the location and content of text and glyphs that the framework recognizes in an image.

## Text detection

- **Recognizing tables within a document**: Scan a document that contains a table and extract its content in a formatted way.
- **Locating and displaying recognized text**: Perform text recognition on a photo using the Vision framework’s text-recognition request.
- **RecognizeDocumentsRequest**: An image-analysis request to scan an image of a document and provide information about its structure.
- **DocumentObservation**: Information about the sections of content that an image-analysis request detects in a document.
- **DetectTextRectanglesRequest**: An image-analysis request that finds regions of visible text in an image.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- ImageProcessingRequest
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- VisionRequest
